author: Rosy Cordero
title: Watch Danny DeVito reads Dr. Seuss' The Lorax on Earth Day
description: Danny DeVito reads Dr. Seuss' 'The Lorax' on Earth Day's 50th anniversary
content:
Danny DeVito is celebrating Earth Day's 50th anniversary by revisiting one of his favorite literary characters.
DeVito dove into Dr. Seuss' The Lorax for a special reading and EW has your exclusive first look. The 1971 children's book is a cautionary tale ab… [+1136 chars]
